Ahead of Market: 10 things that will decide stock action on Wednesday Indian indices, Sensex and Nifty, closed lower on Tuesday, driven by declines in banking, financial, and auto stocks. Sensex fell 821 points and Nifty dropped 258 points. October CPI inflation rose to 6.21%, fueling market concerns for Wednesday.
